short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to react to tweets in emojis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows twitter user to react to tweets with emojis. 
The reaction can be seen by users that also installed this extension.

No extra sign-in needed, 
no personal data collected.

Install the extension and start reacting!
